trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement> class uses classes derived from DiscoveryEndpointProvider to get the discovery endpoint to use.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement>classe utilizza le classi derivate dall'elemento DiscoveryEndpointProvider per ottenere l'endpoint di individuazione da utilizzare.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpointProvider"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpointProvider"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement> class calls the GetDiscoveryEndpoint method on the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpointProvider> instance passed by the user to get the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint> for discovering the services.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement>classe chiama il metodo GetDiscoveryEndpoint sul <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpointProvider>istanza passato dall'utente per ottenere il <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint>per l'individuazione dei servizi.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpointProvider> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement> also calls GetDiscoveryEndpoint method whenever it must clone itself.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement>chiama anche il metodo GetDiscoveryEndpoint ogni volta che si deve duplicare.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement>
